title: Espace 315
content:
Which font is it : “Magnus von Plessen & Kristin Baker”  
Thanks
author: manukball

comments.content: the typefaces seems to be Bookman OldStyle Bold Italic

ok. i will stop id’ing fonts. sheesh.

_not angry at all. just incredibly embarrassed._
Heh heh, George is a force to be reckoned with… ;^P

I think Tiffany got closer on this one:

[ITC Bookman Demi Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127113619/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bookman/demi-italic/testdrive.html?s=Magnus+von+Kristin&p=48).
